original_text: But the men would not agree to this. So the Levite took hold of his slave wife and he pushed her outside. They made her have sex with them all night and they were very cruel to her. At dawn, they let her go.
korean_text: 무리가 듣지 아니하므로 그 사람이 자기 첩을 붙잡아 그들에게 밖으로 끌어내매 그들이 그 여자와 관계하였고 밤새도록 그 여자를 능욕하다가 새벽 미명에 놓은지라

sentences.original_text: But the men would not agree to this.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 남자들은 이것에 동의하지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: So the Levite took hold of his slave wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 레위인은 그의 여종 아내를 잡았고

sentences.original_text: They made her have sex with them all night
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그녀를 밤새도록 성관계를 갖게 했고

sentences.original_text: and they were very cruel to her.
At dawn, they let her go.
